comments.html:
My take is that the markings on the links (eg: 50 - 50 on .102 -> .106) are metrics, so the high-priority orange is only ever going to be setup along .102, .105, .107, .103

Also - LSPs are uni-directional, so the resulting Green Path (3rd diagram) is actually correct - it will only count BW in one direction.
